name: Star Fox Tribute
description:
"Star Fox Tribute" is a game clearly inspired in Star Fox (1993).

   It´s an action/adventure game in which you will have to get the highest score that you could make by destroying the enemies. The game consists of 3 different levels that last 1 minute each.

  This is one of my first 3D games so I really apreciate if you could use the comments to help me improve the next ones. Also, if you find any bug you could text me and I will fix it.

  Assets links are inside the Credits button inside the game.

  Thank you for playing!

CONTROLS:

WASD: To move.

LEFT CLICK: To shoot.
